compositeCheatsheet.name: Create an RCP application using PDE

taskGroup.name: Create an RCP application using PDE
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the individual steps to create a plug-in, define a plug-in based product, customize a product, export an RCP application and define a feature-based product using the Plug-in Development Environment (PDE).
To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically.

task.name: Create a plug-in
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create a plug-in project for an RCP application and execute an RCP application plug-in using PDE.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a plug-in for an RCP application!

task.name: Define a plug-in based product
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to define a plug-in based product configuration for an RCP application and execute an RCP application product using PDE.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just defined a plug-in based product configuration for an RCP application!

task.name: Customize a product
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to add window images, add a splash screen and customize a launcher for an RCP application using PDE.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just customized a product configuration for an RCP application!

task.name: Export an RCP application
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to modify a build configuration for an RCP application and export a RCP application product using PDE.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just exported an RCP application!

task.name: Define a feature-based product
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to define a feature-based product configuration using a plug-in based one and create a feature for an RCP application using PDE.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just defined a feature-based product configuration for an RCP application!
